short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Piez displays optimizations made by Akamai Image Manager, Resource Optimizer, Push/Preconnect, and Script Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Piez is a developer tool that allows a web developer to see total bytes savings on pages that have been optimized using Akamai Image Manager.
